links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Wanda McCaddon''', credited as '''Mac McCaddon''', is a British-born actress currently residing in California.<ref>https://wordwenches.typepad.com/word_wenches/2008/03/audiobook-narra.html</ref><ref>https://www.audiofilemagazine.com/narrators/wanda-mccaddon/</ref> She provided the voice of [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1979 radio series)]].
